extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is running an affected Linux Kernel version (5.8 and later).

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running an affected Linux Kernel version?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Kernel Patch
extracted_playbook.description: Update the Linux Kernel to version 5.16.11, 5.15.25, or 5.10.102 to fix the vulnerability.
